00022 class ContainerDataObject : public DataObject {
00023 protected:
00028      std::vector<DataObject*> mObjects;
00029 
00031      std::map<std::string, DataObject*> mObjectMap;
00032 
00038      ContainerDataObject(const ContainerDataObject& c);
00039 
00047      ContainerDataObject(const Reference& scope, const DOMElement* n) : DataObject(scope, n) {}
00048 
00056      ContainerDataObject(const Reference& ref, const Type& type) : DataObject(ref, type) {}
00057 public:
00058      virtual ~ContainerDataObject();
00059 
00065      const std::vector<DataObject*>& objects() const { return mObjects; }
00066      bool hasChildren() const { return !objects().empty(); }
00067      void add(DataObject* o);
00068      void remove(const std::string& name);
00069      void replace(DataObject* o);
00070 
00071      DataObject* getChild(const std::string& name) const;
00072      void reg() const;
00073      void dereg() const;
00074      std::ostream& bodyXML(std::ostream& o, std::string indent) const;
00075      virtual void print(std::ostream& o, const std::string indent) const;
00076 };
